meaningMnemonic: The <radical>thread</radical> radical and <kanji>thread</kanji> are the same in looks as well as in meaning.
readingMnemonic: You have some <kanji>thread</kanji>... what's the first thing you do with it? You take it and put it in your mouth, and start sucking it down like spaghetti. You have decided to <reading>eat</reading> (いと) the thread.
